channel.title: Why Metadata :: Unreal Metadata Editor Documentation
channel.description: Why use asset Metadata at all? Metadata describes an asset Basic metadata like asset type, mesh poly count or program of origin can be extremely useful. Such information, if easily accessible can be a helpful guide for anyone looking for asset that matches (or doesn’t) certain criteria. It can help you in daily situations like looking for an author of an asset. Of course, this case should be already taken cared by a Version Control System but in that case, it’s the VCS that stores the metadate because metadata can be stored in multiple places - assets itself, VCS systems, external files or databases.
